command.text: select "DepRequest"."reqID" "reqID" ,"DepRequest"."Group_ID" "Group_ID" ,"Group_"."Emp_NOt" "Group_Emp_NOt" ,"Group_sgm"."sgm_Nm" "Group_sgmsgm_Nm" ,"Group_sgmOpco"."OpcoName" "Group_sgmOpcoOpcoName" ,"Group_salrycat"."grade_desc_a" "Group_salrycatgrade_desc_a" ,"Group_salrycatEarning_"."Earning_Nm" "Group_salrycatEarning_Earning_Nm" ,"Group_Blood_Type"."ModifiedBy" "Group_Blood_TypeModifiedBy" ,"Group_Bnk_"."Bnk_Acc" "Group_Bnk_Bnk_Acc" ,"Group_Sub_Bnk"."Bnk_Acc" "Group_Sub_BnkBnk_Acc" ,"Group_Cntry_"."Cntry_Nm" "Group_Cntry_Cntry_Nm" ,"Group_Depm_"."Depm_Nm" "Group_Depm_Depm_Nm" ,"Group_Educt_Type"."Educt_Nm" "Group_Educt_TypeEduct_Nm" ,"Group_Job_Stu"."Emp_Stunm" "Group_Job_StuEmp_Stunm" ,"Group_Earning_"."Earning_Nm" "Group_Earning_Earning_Nm" ,"Group_Job_"."Job_Nm" "Group_Job_Job_Nm" ,"Group_Ownr_"."Ownr_ID" "Group_Ownr_Ownr_ID" ,"Group_Ownr_cmp_"."Grp_Nm" "Group_Ownr_cmp_Grp_Nm" ,"Group_Reljan"."Reljan_nm" "Group_ReljanReljan_nm" ,"Group_Status_Type"."Status_Nm" "Group_Status_TypeStatus_Nm" ,"Group_branch"."Desc1" "Group_branchDesc1" ,"Group_branchsgm"."sgm_Nm" "Group_branchsgmsgm_Nm" ,"Group_branchGender"."Gender" "Group_branchGenderGender" ,"Group_branchstage"."ShortDesc1" "Group_branchstageShortDesc1" ,"Group_branchschtyp"."schtypDesc" "Group_branchschtypschtypDesc" ,"DepRequest"."Emp_no" "Emp_no" ,"Emp_"."Emp_Nm1" "Emp_Emp_Nm1" ,"Emp_Blood_Type"."ModifiedBy" "Emp_Blood_TypeModifiedBy" ,"Emp_Cntry_"."Cntry_Nm" "Emp_Cntry_Cntry_Nm" ,"Emp_Kindg_"."Deduc_Nm" "Emp_Kindg_Deduc_Nm" ,"Emp_Educt_Type"."Educt_Nm" "Emp_Educt_TypeEduct_Nm" ,"Emp_Group_"."Emp_NOt" "Emp_Group_Emp_NOt" ,"Emp_Group_sgm"."sgm_Nm" "Emp_Group_sgmsgm_Nm" ,"Emp_Group_salrycat"."grade_desc_a" "Emp_Group_salrycatgrade_desc_a" ,"Emp_Group_Blood_Type"."ModifiedBy" "Emp_Group_Blood_TypeModifiedBy" ,"Emp_Group_Bnk_"."Bnk_Acc" "Emp_Group_Bnk_Bnk_Acc" ,"Emp_Group_Sub_Bnk"."Bnk_Acc" "Emp_Group_Sub_BnkBnk_Acc" ,"Emp_Group_Cntry_"."Cntry_Nm" "Emp_Group_Cntry_Cntry_Nm" ,"Emp_Group_Depm_"."Depm_Nm" "Emp_Group_Depm_Depm_Nm" ,"Emp_Group_Educt_Type"."Educt_Nm" "Emp_Group_Educt_TypeEduct_Nm" ,"Emp_Group_Job_Stu"."Emp_Stunm" "Emp_Group_Job_StuEmp_Stunm" ,"Emp_Group_Earning_"."Earning_Nm" "Emp_Group_Earning_Earning_Nm" ,"Emp_Group_Job_"."Job_Nm" "Emp_Group_Job_Job_Nm" ,"Emp_Group_Ownr_"."Ownr_ID" "Emp_Group_Ownr_Ownr_ID" ,"Emp_Group_Reljan"."Reljan_nm" "Emp_Group_ReljanReljan_nm" ,"Emp_Group_Status_Type"."Status_Nm" "Emp_Group_Status_TypeStatus_Nm" ,"Emp_Group_branch"."Desc1" "Emp_Group_branchDesc1" ,"Emp_Job_"."Job_Nm" "Emp_Job_Job_Nm" ,"Emp_Reljan"."Reljan_nm" "Emp_ReljanReljan_nm" ,"Emp_Status_Type"."Status_Nm" "Emp_Status_TypeStatus_Nm" ,"DepRequest"."reqcat_id" "reqcat_id" ,"reqcat_"."reqcat_name" "reqcat_reqcat_name" ,"reqcat_Req_type"."req_Type" "reqcat_Req_typereq_Type" ,"reqcat_Req_typeuserarea_"."userarea_Desc" "reqcat_Req_typeuserarea_userarea_Desc" ,"DepRequest"."req_createDate" "req_createDate" ,"DepRequest"."req_creatoruser" "req_creatoruser" ,"DepRequest"."req_details" "req_details" ,"DepRequest"."doc_numb" "doc_numb" ,"DepRequest"."issue_Place" "issue_Place" ,"DepRequest"."issue_date" "issue_date" ,"DepRequest"."End_date" "End_date" ,"DepRequest"."ModifiedBy" "ModifiedBy" ,"DepRequest"."ModifiedOn" "ModifiedOn" ,"DepRequest"."CreatedBy" "CreatedBy" ,"DepRequest"."CreatedOn" "CreatedOn" from "dbo"."DepRequest" "DepRequest" left join "dbo"."Pyempmfs" "Group_" on "DepRequest"."Group_ID" = "Group_"."Emp_No" left join "dbo"."glmulcmp" "Group_sgm" on "Group_"."sgm" = "Group_sgm"."sgmid" left join "dbo"."OpCo" "Group_sgmOpco" on "Group_sgm"."OpcoID" = "Group_sgmOpco"."OpcoIDidentity" left join "dbo"."grade" "Group_salrycat" on "Group_"."salrycat" = "Group_salrycat"."grade_code" left join "dbo"."Pyerntsalyp1" "Group_salrycatEarning_" on "Group_salrycat"."Earning_No" = "Group_salrycatEarning_"."Earning_No" left join "dbo"."pyBlood" "Group_Blood_Type" on "Group_"."Blood_Type" = "Group_Blood_Type"."Blood_Type" left join "dbo"."PybnkAcc" "Group_Bnk_" on "Group_"."Bnk_No" = "Group_Bnk_"."Bnk_No" left join "dbo"."PybnkAcc" "Group_Sub_Bnk" on "Group_"."Sub_Bnk" = "Group_Sub_Bnk"."Bnk_No" left join "dbo"."PYCntry" "Group_Cntry_" on "Group_"."Cntry_No" = "Group_Cntry_"."Cntry_No" left join "dbo"."Pydepm" "Group_Depm_" on "Group_"."Depm_No" = "Group_Depm_"."Depm_No" left join "dbo"."PyempEdu" "Group_Educt_Type" on "Group_"."Educt_Type" = "Group_Educt_Type"."Educt_Type" left join "dbo"."Pyempstu" "Group_Job_Stu" on "Group_"."Job_Stu" = "Group_Job_Stu"."Emp_stu" left join "dbo"."Pyerntsalyp1" "Group_Earning_" on "Group_"."Earning_no" = "Group_Earning_"."Earning_No" left join "dbo"."Pyjobs" "Group_Job_" on "Group_"."Job_No" = "Group_Job_"."Job_No" left join "dbo"."Pyownrmf" "Group_Ownr_" on "Group_"."Ownr_No" = "Group_Ownr_"."Ownr_No" left join "dbo"."Pycnstnt" "Group_Ownr_cmp_" on "Group_Ownr_"."cmp_no" = "Group_Ownr_cmp_"."Cmp_No" left join "dbo"."PyReljan" "Group_Reljan" on "Group_"."Reljan" = "Group_Reljan"."reljan" left join "dbo"."PyStatus" "Group_Status_Type" on "Group_"."Status_Type" = "Group_Status_Type"."Status_Type" left join "dbo"."schBranch" "Group_branch" on "Group_"."branch" = "Group_branch"."branch" left join "dbo"."glmulcmp" "Group_branchsgm" on "Group_branch"."sgm" = "Group_branchsgm"."sgmid" left join "dbo"."PyGender" "Group_branchGender" on "Group_branch"."Genderid" = "Group_branchGender"."Genderid" left join "dbo"."schStage" "Group_branchstage" on "Group_branch"."stagecode" = "Group_branchstage"."Code" left join "dbo"."schtyp" "Group_branchschtyp" on "Group_branch"."schtypid" = "Group_branchschtyp"."schtypid" left join "dbo"."Pydependent" "Emp_" on "DepRequest"."Emp_no" = "Emp_"."Emp_No" left join "dbo"."pyBlood" "Emp_Blood_Type" on "Emp_"."Blood_Type" = "Emp_Blood_Type"."Blood_Type" left join "dbo"."PYCntry" "Emp_Cntry_" on "Emp_"."Cntry_No" = "Emp_Cntry_"."Cntry_No" left join "dbo"."Pydedctyp" "Emp_Kindg_" on "Emp_"."Kindg_id" = "Emp_Kindg_"."Deduc_No" left join "dbo"."PyempEdu" "Emp_Educt_Type" on "Emp_"."Educt_Type" = "Emp_Educt_Type"."Educt_Type" left join "dbo"."Pyempmfs" "Emp_Group_" on "Emp_"."Group_ID" = "Emp_Group_"."Emp_No" left join "dbo"."glmulcmp" "Emp_Group_sgm" on "Emp_Group_"."sgm" = "Emp_Group_sgm"."sgmid" left join "dbo"."grade" "Emp_Group_salrycat" on "Emp_Group_"."salrycat" = "Emp_Group_salrycat"."grade_code" left join "dbo"."pyBlood" "Emp_Group_Blood_Type" on "Emp_Group_"."Blood_Type" = "Emp_Group_Blood_Type"."Blood_Type" left join "dbo"."PybnkAcc" "Emp_Group_Bnk_" on "Emp_Group_"."Bnk_No" = "Emp_Group_Bnk_"."Bnk_No" left join "dbo"."PybnkAcc" "Emp_Group_Sub_Bnk" on "Emp_Group_"."Sub_Bnk" = "Emp_Group_Sub_Bnk"."Bnk_No" left join "dbo"."PYCntry" "Emp_Group_Cntry_" on "Emp_Group_"."Cntry_No" = "Emp_Group_Cntry_"."Cntry_No" left join "dbo"."Pydepm" "Emp_Group_Depm_" on "Emp_Group_"."Depm_No" = "Emp_Group_Depm_"."Depm_No" left join "dbo"."PyempEdu" "Emp_Group_Educt_Type" on "Emp_Group_"."Educt_Type" = "Emp_Group_Educt_Type"."Educt_Type" left join "dbo"."Pyempstu" "Emp_Group_Job_Stu" on "Emp_Group_"."Job_Stu" = "Emp_Group_Job_Stu"."Emp_stu" left join "dbo"."Pyerntsalyp1" "Emp_Group_Earning_" on "Emp_Group_"."Earning_no" = "Emp_Group_Earning_"."Earning_No" left join "dbo"."Pyjobs" "Emp_Group_Job_" on "Emp_Group_"."Job_No" = "Emp_Group_Job_"."Job_No" left join "dbo"."Pyownrmf" "Emp_Group_Ownr_" on "Emp_Group_"."Ownr_No" = "Emp_Group_Ownr_"."Ownr_No" left join "dbo"."PyReljan" "Emp_Group_Reljan" on "Emp_Group_"."Reljan" = "Emp_Group_Reljan"."reljan" left join "dbo"."PyStatus" "Emp_Group_Status_Type" on "Emp_Group_"."Status_Type" = "Emp_Group_Status_Type"."Status_Type" left join "dbo"."schBranch" "Emp_Group_branch" on "Emp_Group_"."branch" = "Emp_Group_branch"."branch" left join "dbo"."Pyjobs" "Emp_Job_" on "Emp_"."Job_No" = "Emp_Job_"."Job_No" left join "dbo"."PyReljan" "Emp_Reljan" on "Emp_"."Reljan" = "Emp_Reljan"."reljan" left join "dbo"."PyStatus" "Emp_Status_Type" on "Emp_"."Status_Type" = "Emp_Status_Type"."Status_Type" left join "dbo"."RequestCategories" "reqcat_" on "DepRequest"."reqcat_id" = "reqcat_"."reqcat_id" left join "dbo"."RequestTypes" "reqcat_Req_type" on "reqcat_"."Req_typeid" = "reqcat_Req_type"."req_Typeid" left join "dbo"."Userarea" "reqcat_Req_typeuserarea_" on "reqcat_Req_type"."userarea_id" = "reqcat_Req_typeuserarea_"."userarea_id"
